languages.text: Параметр, от которого зависит сколько клеток требуется пройти кораблю по прямой, чтобы повернуться на 45 градусов. Чем больше маневренность, тем меньше клеток требуется пройти.
A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.
languages.original_text: Параметр, от которого зависит сколько клеток требуется пройти кораблю по прямой, чтобы повернуться на 45 градусов. Чем больше маневренность, тем меньше клеток требуется пройти.

traits.locale_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.
A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.
A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.
A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.
A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

languages.text: Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie viele Felder ein Schiff zurücklegen muss, bevor es sich um 45 Grad drehen kann. Je höher die Manövrierbarkeit des Schiffs ist, desto weniger Felder muss es zurücklegen.
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie viele Felder ein Schiff zurücklegen muss, bevor es sich um 45 Grad {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}drehen{/g} kann. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeitswert{/g} des Schiffs ist, desto weniger Felder muss es zurücklegen.

Dieser Parameter legt fest, wie viele Felder ein Schiff zurücklegen muss, bevor es sich um 45 Grad {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}drehen{/g} kann. Je höher die Manövrierbarkeit des Schiffs ist, desto weniger Felder muss es zurücklegen.

languages.text: Paramètre qui détermine le nombre de cases qu'un vaisseau doit franchir avant de pouvoir virer à 45 degrés. Plus l'indice de manœuvrabilité du vaisseau est élevé, moins il doit franchir de cases.
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: Paramètre qui détermine le nombre de cases qu'un vaisseau doit franchir avant de pouvoir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}virer{/g} à 45 degrés. Plus l'indice de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} du vaisseau est élevé, moins il doit franchir de cases.

Paramètre qui détermine le nombre de cases qu'un vaisseau doit franchir avant de pouvoir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}virer{/g} à 45 degrés. Plus l'indice de manœuvrabilité du vaisseau est élevé, moins il doit franchir de cases.

languages.text: 这个属性代表舰船需要至少移动多少格，才能转向45度。舰船的机动性越高，转向之前需要移动的格数就越少。
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: 这个属性代表舰船需要至少移动多少格，才能转向45度。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}越高，转向之前需要移动的格数就越少。
这个属性代表舰船需要至少移动多少格，才能转向45度。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}舰船的机动性越高，转向之前需要移动的格数就越少。

languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

languages.text: Un parámetro que determina cuántas casillas tiene que avanzar la nave antes de poder girar 45 grados. Cuanto mayor sea la maniobrabilidad de la nave, menos casillas necesita.
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: Un parámetro que determina cuántas casillas tiene que avanzar la nave antes de poder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}girar{/g} 45 grados. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} de la nave, menos casillas necesita.

languages.text: 船が45度回転するために必要なセルの数を決めるパラメータ。船の操縦性レートが高いほど、移動に必要なセルの数は少なくなる。
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: 船が45度{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回転{/g}するために必要なセルの数を決めるパラメータ。船の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}レートが高いほど、移動に必要なセルの数は少なくなる。
船が45度{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回転{/g}するために必要なセルの数を決めるパラメータ。船の操縦性レートが高いほど、移動に必要なセルの数は少なくなる。

languages.text: Bir geminin 45 derece dönebilmesi için kaç hücre ilerlemesi gerektiğini belirleyen bir parametre. Manevra kabiliyeti ne kadar yüksekse aşması gereken hücre sayısı da o kadar az olur.
languages.original_text: A parameter that determines how many cells a ship must pass before it can turn 45 degrees. The higher the ship's manoeuvrability rating, the fewer cells it must travel.

traits.locale_text: Bir geminin 45 derece dönebilmesi için kaç hücre ilerlemesi gerektiğini belirleyen bir parametre. Manevra kabiliyeti ne kadar yüksekse aşması gereken hücre sayısı da o kadar az olur.
